detectors.description:
Pausable.whenNotPaused() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#387-390) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-require(bool)(! paused) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#388)

ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#241-248) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#245)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#246)

ERADIX (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#450-482) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions

	- Ownable._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#329)
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#344-346)
	- Ownable.onlyOwner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#351-354)
	- Ownable.isOwner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#359-361)
	- Ownable.onlyOwner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#351-354)
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#367-371)
	- Ownable.isOwner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#359-361)
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#367-371)
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#344-346)

detectors.description: Pragma version^0.5.0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#1) allows old versions
Constant ERADIX.initialSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#455) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

ERADIX.smartfastConstructorConstantVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#450-482) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 100000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERADIX.sol#455)
